duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct industrial hygiene assessments to identify workplace hazards, including exposure to chemicals, noise, dust, and physical agents.
Collect and analyze samples using appropriate techniques and equipment.
Assist in interpreting data and preparing reports on findings.
Develop control measures and recommendations for hazard prevention and risk reduction.
Assist in the implementation and evaluation of workplace control strategies.
Support the development and delivery of training programs on industrial hygiene.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Industrial Hygiene, Occupational Health, or a related field. ABET or EHAC accreditation is preferred.
